streetCatalogImportDesc: Import or update your street catalog.
aboutMadeBy: RouteScout was made by Arne Sostack in 2025
dashboardWelcome: Welcome to the RouteScout Dashboard! Here you can find an overview of your routes and activities.
projectsDescription: Manage your RouteScout projects. Create new projects or select an existing one to work with.
noProjects: No projects found. Create your first project to get started.
landingSubtitle: Smart route planning and dispatch management for your delivery operations
landingSignInButton: Sign in with Google to Get Started
landingFeatureSmartRoutePlanningDesc: Automatically organize stops into efficient routes based on location and capacity
landingFeatureTrailerManagementDesc: Manage different trailer sizes and optimize load capacity for each route
landingFeatureTeamCoordinationDesc: Assign routes to teams and track progress in real-time
landingFeatureLiveTrackingDesc: Monitor deliveries and update stop statuses as work progresses
landingHowItWorksStep1Desc: Set up your delivery project and import stops from addresses
landingHowItWorksStep2Desc: Drag and drop stops to create routes and assign them to teams
landingHowItWorksStep3Desc: Teams complete deliveries and update statuses in real-time
landingCtaSubtitle: Sign in with your Google account to get started
loginSubtitle: Sign in to manage your delivery routes
